snippet.title: The Basement I Horror Game Trailer I Studentproject
snippet.description:
Happy Halloween everyone! :)
The Basement is another project that was made in just a week from 8 students, including me.
You wake up in an unknown place and you have to find clues what happened and how you can escape the dark and scary basement. There are secrets to uncover but be careful … there is someone…something with you down there.

I’m proud about this project and also I want to thank my team members for doing this great demo game :)

Credits:
Lea Kronenberger – VFX, Modelling, Texturing
Nicole Schütte – Level Design, Modelling, Texturing, Trailer
Marcel Schmidt – Programmingu have to find clues what happened and how you can escape the dark and scary basement. There are secrets to uncover but be carefu
Alex Brüning – Modelling, Texturing
Vanessa Schrader – Modelling
Juliane Spiering – Modelling
Larissa Moritz – 2D Art

Music: Colossal Trailer Music - Paranormal

I DON'T OWN THE SONG. ALL RIGHTS BELONG TO THE ORIGINAL PRODUCER.
